name: Texas Hold'em
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-8, HD (High Definition), Xbox LIVE Vision. Upgrade to the full game! Test your skills in Xbox LIVE tournaments and custom matches, or simply enjoy a friendly game with your pals. Measure your progress with our unique bankroll system, and track your stats by profile. Texas Hold'em features advanced AI, multiple configurable game modes, and Xbox LIVE Vision camera support. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/LIVE/accounts.
